HERO.TITLE: Hi, I'm Steven!
HERO.SUBTITLE: Full-stack Developer
HERO.DESCRIPTION: +2 years of professional experience as Systems Engineer in Full-stack Development. Skilled in programming, databases and seamless user experience reation. Expert in modern technologies and good development practices, focused on creating robust and scalable solutions.

JOB_1.TITLE: Front-end Developer
JOB_1.SUBTITLE: Technology Infosys
JOB_1.DESCRIPTION: Developed and implemented an administration system for IPS using ReactJS, NextJS and TypeScript. Focused on reusable components, integrating APIs for personnel management, and collaborating with the backend team to ensure data transmission and meet project deadlines.

JOB_2.TITLE: Full-stack Developer
JOB_2.DESCRIPTION: Developed administration systems with Vue.js and Vuetify in the frontend for dynamic interfaces, and Django Rest Framework in the backend. Implemented CRUD operations and endpoints for efficient data manipulation.

JOB_3.TITLE: Junior Systems Analyst
JOB_3.SUBTITLE: Solarium Energy S.A.S
JOB_3.DESCRIPTION: Analyzed requirements and programmed information systems with HTML5, JavaScript and CSS. Managed the teacher evaluation at the Universidad Piloto de Colombia and collaborated in the installation of systems for dental and radiological clinics, ensuring their efficiency and suitability to specific needs.
